document_data.name: Derg
document_data.mainbody:
'''Derg''' was a cowardly [[orc]] who served [[red dragon]] [[Firkraag]] in [[Firkraag's Maze|his maze]] in the [[Windspear Hills]] of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Dig..? You torment wit funny words and projecting voice. You gonna kill, just says so. I scream now. Gaaaahh!''|Derg the Orc}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, [[Flaylan]] and Derg were found in the quarters next to the kitchens of Firkraag's Maze. When [[Abdel Adrian]] was lured into the dungeon, he and his companions confronted the duo of orcs. Flaylan and Derg begged for mercy and showed no aggression towards the [[Bhaalspawn]], claiming to had only been following their master's orders. It was unrecorded if the adventurers spared the duo of orcs, allowing them to the Windspear Hills.
